'''1.21.03''' (Windows) or '''1.21.03.0''' (iOS), the first release of the '''Cloud Update''',<ref>{{Cite|url=https://education.minecraft.net/en-us/blog/cloud-update|title=The 1.21 Cloud Update is here!|date=July 23, 2024|website=Minecraft Education}}</ref> is a major update to {{EE}}, released on July 23, 2024.<ref>{{cite|url=https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/23323615654164-What-s-New-in-the-Cloud-Update-v1-21-03|title=What's New in the Cloud Update (v1.21.03)|website=Minecraft: Education Edition Support}}</ref> It adds the ability to backup worlds to OneDrive, as well as introducing new features from the '''[[Bats and Pots]]''', '''[[Armored Paws]]''', and '''[[Tricky Trials]]''' updates.

'''Cloud World Backup - Upload'''
* Worlds are automatically uploaded to OneDrive upon world close as a backup.<ref>{{cite|url=https://educommunity.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/19632132361748-Cloud-Upload-and-Download|title=Cloud Upload and Download|website=Minecraft: Education Edition Support}}</ref>
** Future preview updates will add the ability to download and open worlds from OneDrive.
* IT Admins will need to ensure that the following URLs are allowlisted through the network:
** [https://graph.microsoft.com graph.microsoft.com]
** [https://*.sharepoint.com *.sharepoint.com]
* "Recipe Unlocking" and Recipe Book search improvements when playing in [[Survival]] mode.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''General'''
* Chemistry items like [[balloon]]s, [[compound]]s, and [[glow stick]]s are now available in the [[Creative inventory]].

=== General ===
* The "Manage Account" button has been moved to the bottom right of the home screen.

== Fixes ==
* Improvements to performance and game stability.
